tool_description: Real-time live odds from bookmaker fonbet.ru
name: Fonbet live
title: Fonbet live

api_list.name: Get games odds

required_parameters.name: SportName
required_parameters.description:
available sports: Basketball, Football, IceHockey, Tennis

Event->period:
**Main** - Without overtime
**MainFull** - With overtime

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fonbet-live.p.rapidapi.com/odds/Football"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fonbet-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://fonbet-live.p.rapidapi.com/odds/{sportname}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fonbet-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
